verses.text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilæans, whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices.

And Jesus answering said unto them, \+w Suppose ye|strong="G1380"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w these|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w Galilæans|strong="G1057"\+w* \+w were|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w sinners|strong="G0268"\+w* \+w above|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w the Galilæans|strong="G1057"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w they suffered|strong="G3958"\+w* \+w such things|strong="G5108"\+w*?

\+w I tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Nay|strong="G3780"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w*, \+w except|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye repent|strong="G3340"\+w*, \+w ye shall|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w likewise|strong="G5615"\+w* \+w perish|strong="G0622"\+w*.

\+w Or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w those|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w eighteen|strong="G1176"\+w*, \+w upon|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the tower|strong="G4444"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w Siloam|strong="G4611"\+w* \+w fell|strong="G4098"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w slew|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w think ye|strong="G1380"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w they|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w were|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w sinners|strong="G3781"\+w* \+w above|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w that dwelt|strong="G2730"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w*?

\+w I tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Nay|strong="G3780"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w*, \+w except|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye repent|strong="G3340"\+w*, \+w ye shall|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w likewise|strong="G3668"\+w* \+w perish|strong="G0622"\+w*.

¶ He spake also this parable; \+w A certain|strong="G5100"\+w* \+add man\+add* \+w had|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w a fig tree|strong="G4808"\+w* \+w planted|strong="G5452"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he came|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w and sought|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w thereon|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w found|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w none|strong="G3756"\+w*.

\+w Then|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w said he|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the dresser of his vineyard|strong="G0289"\+w*, \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w these three|strong="G5140"\+w* \+w years|strong="G2094"\+w* \+w I come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w seeking|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w fig tree|strong="G4808"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w none|strong="G3756"\+w*: \+w cut|strong="G1581"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w down|strong="G1581"\+w*; \+w why|strong="G2444"\+w* \+w cumbereth|strong="G2673"\+w* \+w it|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w the ground|strong="G1093"\+w*?

\+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he answering|strong="G0611"\+w* \+w said|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w let|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w year|strong="G2094"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w till|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w I shall dig|strong="G4626"\+w* \+w about|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w dung|strong="G2874"\+w* \+add it\+add*:

\+w And if|strong="G2579"\+w* \+w it bear|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w*, \+add well\+add*: \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*, \+add then\+add* \+w after that|strong="G3195"\+w* \+w thou shalt cut|strong="G1581"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w down|strong="G1581"\+w*.
And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath.
¶ And, behold, there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years, and was bowed together, and could in no wise lift up herself.

And when Jesus saw her, he called her to him, and said unto her, \+w Woman|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w thou art loosed|strong="G0630"\+w* \+w from thine|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w infirmity|strong="G0769"\+w*.
And he laid hishands on her: and immediately she was made straight, and glorified God.

And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation, because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day, and said unto the people, There are six days in which men ought to work: in them therefore come and be healed, and not on the sabbath day.

The Lord then answered him, and said, \+add Thou\+add* \+w hypocrite|strong="G5273"\+w*, \+w doth|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w each one|strong="G1538"\+w* \+w of you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w on the sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w loose|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w ox|strong="G1016"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+add his\+add* \+w ass|strong="G3688"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the stall|strong="G5336"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w lead|strong="G0520"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w away|strong="G0520"\+w* \+w to watering|strong="G4222"\+w*?

\+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ought|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w this woman|strong="G3778"\+w*, \+w being|strong="G5607"\+w* \+w a daughter|strong="G2364"\+w* \+w of Abraham|strong="G0011"\+w*, \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w* \+w hath bound|strong="G1210"\+w*, \+w lo|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w these eighteen|strong="G1176"\+w* \+w years|strong="G2094"\+w*, \+w be loosed|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w bond|strong="G1199"\+w* \+w on the sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w*?
And when he had said these things, all his adversaries were ashamed: and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him.

¶ Then said he, \+w Unto what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w like|strong="G3664"\+w*? \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whereunto|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w shall I resemble|strong="G3666"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*?

\+w It is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w like|strong="G3664"\+w* \+w a grain|strong="G2848"\+w* \+w of mustard seed|strong="G4615"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w took|strong="G2983"\+w*, \+w and cast|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w garden|strong="G2779"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it grew|strong="G0837"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w waxed|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w a great|strong="G3173"\+w* \+w tree|strong="G1186"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the fowls|strong="G4071"\+w* \+w of the air|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w lodged|strong="G2681"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the branches|strong="G2798"\+w* \+w of it|strong="G0846"\+w*.
And again he said, \+w Whereunto|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w shall I liken|strong="G3666"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*?

\+w It is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w like|strong="G3664"\+w* \+w leaven|strong="G2219"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w a woman|strong="G1135"\+w* \+w took|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w and hid|strong="G1470"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w three|strong="G5140"\+w* \+w measures|strong="G4568"\+w* \+w of meal|strong="G0224"\+w*, \+w till|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w the whole|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w was leavened|strong="G2220"\+w*.
And he went through the cities and villages, teaching, and journeying toward Jerusalem.
Then said one unto him, Lord, are there few that be saved? And he said unto them,

¶ \+w Strive|strong="G0075"\+w* \+w to enter in|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the strait|strong="G4728"\+w* \+w gate|strong="G4439"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w will seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w to enter in|strong="G1525"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2480"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w be able|strong="G2480"\+w*.

\+w When|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w once|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the master of the house|strong="G3617"\+w* \+w is risen up|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w hath shut to|strong="G0608"\+w* \+w the door|strong="G2374"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye begin|strong="G0756"\+w* \+w to stand|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w without|strong="G1854"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to knock|strong="G2925"\+w* \+w at the door|strong="G2374"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w open|strong="G0455"\+w* \+w unto us|strong="G2254"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he shall answer|strong="G0611"\+w* \+w and say|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w I know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w ye are|strong="G2075"\+w*:

\+w Then|strong="G5119"\+w* \+w shall ye begin|strong="G0756"\+w* \+w to say|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w We have eaten|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w drunk|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w in thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w presence|strong="G1799"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thou hast taught|strong="G1321"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w our|strong="G2257"\+w* \+w streets|strong="G4113"\+w*.

\+w But|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he shall say|strong="G2046"\+w*, \+w I tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w I know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w ye are|strong="G2075"\+w*; \+w depart|strong="G0868"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*, \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+add ye\+add* \+w workers|strong="G2040"\+w* \+w of iniquity|strong="G0093"\+w*.

\+w There|strong="G1563"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w weeping|strong="G2805"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w gnashing|strong="G1030"\+w* \+w of teeth|strong="G3599"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w ye shall see|strong="G3700"\+w* \+w Abraham|strong="G0011"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Isaac|strong="G2464"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Jacob|strong="G2384"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w the prophets|strong="G4396"\+w*, \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+add yourselves\+add* \+w thrust|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1854"\+w*.

\+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they shall come|strong="G2240"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the east|strong="G0395"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add from\+add* \+w the west|strong="G1424"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the north|strong="G1005"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add from\+add* \+w the south|strong="G3558"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall sit down|strong="G0347"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.

\+w And|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w there are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w last|strong="G2078"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w there are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w last|strong="G2078"\+w*.
¶ The same day there came certain of the Pharisees, saying unto him, Get thee out, and depart hence: for Herod will kill thee.

And he said unto them, \+w Go ye|strong="G4198"\+w*, \+w and tell|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w fox|strong="G0258"\+w*, \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w I cast out|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w devils|strong="G1140"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I do|strong="G2005"\+w* \+w cures|strong="G2392"\+w* \+w to day|strong="G4594"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to morrow|strong="G0839"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the third|strong="G5154"\+w* \+add day\+add* \+w I shall be perfected|strong="G5048"\+w*.

\+w Nevertheless|strong="G4133"\+w* \+w I|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w to day|strong="G4594"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to morrow|strong="G0839"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G3588"\+w* \+add day\+add* \+w following|strong="G2192"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w it|strong="G1735"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1735"\+w* \+w that a prophet|strong="G4396"\+w* \+w perish|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w out of|strong="G1854"\+w* \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w*.

\+w O Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w*, \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w killest|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w the prophets|strong="G4396"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w stonest|strong="G3036"\+w* \+w them that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w are sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+w how often|strong="G4212"\+w* \+w would|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w I have gathered|strong="G1996"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w* \+w together|strong="G1996"\+w*, \+w as|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w a hen|strong="G3733"\+w* \+add doth gather\+add* \+w her|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w brood|strong="G3555"\+w* \+w under|strong="G5259"\+w* \+add her\+add* \+w wings|strong="G4420"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye would|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*!

\+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w is left|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w desolate|strong="G2048"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Ye shall|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w see|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w until|strong="G2193"\+w* \+add the time\+add* \+w come|strong="G2240"\+w* \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w ye shall say|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w Blessed|strong="G2127"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w of the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*.
